name: RTCPeerConnection.peeridentity_event
description: The peeridentity event is sent to the connection concerned when peer identity has been set and verified on it. The new identiy can be access using the RTCPeerConnection.peerIdentity property.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
